ofx:section.ofx:title: JBoss-AS7 WAR
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
1. Isolate the WAR Creating a specific classloading definition file for theGeoServer WAR by putting the file jboss-classloading.xml defined as below into the geoserver.war/WEB-INF directory.
2. Remove the following jars from geoserver.war/WEB-INF/lib directory servlet-api-2.5.jar stax-api-1.0.1.jar xalan-2.7.0.jar xercesImpl-2.6.2.jar xml-apis-1.3.04.jar xml-apis-xerces-2.7.1.jar
